description: Follow live text commentary, score updates and match stats from Annecy vs Bastia in the Ligue 2
title: Annecy vs Bastia: Ligue 2 stats & head-to-head
title_page: Annecy vs Bastia: Ligue 2 stats & head-to-head - BBC Sport
maintext:
Post
Attempt missed. Tom Meynadier (Bastia) right footed shot from outside the box is too high. Assisted by Amine Boutrah following a corner.
Post
Fourth official has announced 5 minutes of added time.
Post
Attempt saved. Axel Drouhin (Annecy) header from the centre of the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Josué Tiendrébéogo with a cross.
Post
Anthony Bermont (Annecy) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Booking
Christophe Vincent (Bastia) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
Post
Attempt blocked. Christophe Vincent (Bastia) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked. Assisted by Julien Maggiotti.
